episode_summary: This episode covers a range of quirky and intriguing facts, including the Queen's numerous birthdays, a Brazilian political mishap involving WhatsApp, a German city's unique approach to combating terrorism, and the surprising movement of the North Pole towards Greenwich, London.

facts.fact: This week the queen will celebrate her 669th birthday.
The Brazilian vice president accidentally released his presidential acceptance speech by sending it to the wrong WhatsApp group.
A German city is fighting global terror by banning number plates starting with IS.
The North Pole is on a head-on collision course with Greenwich London.
